4308900.name: Brimstone Demo
4308900.description:
A peaceful fantasy, shattered by monsters invading from an evil realm. Now death and despair riddle the land. And it's all up to you to stop it. It's time to fight fire... with Brimstone. 

Brimstone is a fast-paced old school first-person shooter game with powerful guns, tactical magic, and a flying ability to allow for advanced verticality. Players will use their arsenal and abilities to fight a wide range of deadly enemies, challenging players' will to survive. 

Brimstone is set a world with a blend of both fantasy and sci-fi, appearing medieval and gothic on the outside, but has modern and advanced technology on the inside. And most curiously, this world is populated by a race of horse-people.

Inspired by both modern and retro-FPS classics, such as Doom, Team fortress 2, and Ultrakill, Brimstone mixes classic retro-shooter gameplay with modern, high-octane action & set pieces.
